news.title: Amazon sellers raise prices after Trump's China tariff: 'It's unsustainable'
news.summary: Amazon third-party sellers are raising prices and looking for new suppliers. President Trump lifted tariffs on goods from China. Amazon is looking to find new suppliers to fill the gap.

news.title: Trump insists bond market tumult didn't influence tariff pause: 'I wasn't worried'
news.summary: "I wasn't worried," Trump said in  a Time magazine interview during which he was asked about financial market tumult. Trump said he was "not worried" about the stock market.

news.title: Trump signs order to boost deep-sea mining, seeking to break China's critical minerals dominance
news.summary: The practice of deep-sea mining involves using heavy machinery to remove minerals and metals from the seabed. The minerals build up into potato-sized nodules.

news.title: Trump asserts trade talks with China are underway after Beijing denies any ongoing negotiations
news.summary: The statement followed China's denial of any talks with the U.S. and calls for abolishing 'unilateral' tariff measures for resolving trade issues.

news.title: Russia tests U.S. patience as Trump rushes to clinch Ukraine peace deal in first 100 days in office
news.summary: U.S. special envoy Steve Witkoff is expected to carry out further peace talks with Russian President Vladimir Putin on Friday. U.S.-Russian peace talks are expected to take place in Moscow.

news.title: Intel’s turnaround deemed a ‘herculean task’ — so analysts say to avoid the stock
news.summary: Intel's stock is down after earnings, and "there seems little to get excited about," says one analyst. Intel is the world’s largest chip maker.

news.title: Think groceries are already too expensive? Wait until RFK Jr.’s food-dye ban hits, experts say.
news.summary: The cost of going from synthetic to natural dyes could hike annual food costs by thousands of dollars per household, one data scientist warns. The cost of switching from synthetic dyes to natural ones could be as high as $10,000 per household.

news.title: Samuel Adams’s parent company points to gains in light beer as tastes shift from craft brews
news.summary: Boston Beer Co. says that the company faces long-term challenges. Boston Beer says that it is committed to making the best beer possible. The company says it will continue to invest in innovation.

news.title: Don’t count on ‘drill, baby, drill,’ Schlumberger says
news.summary: Schlumberger's stock falls after a rare earnings miss and a warning that a slowing economy and uncertain tariff policies could hurt demand for oil drilling.

news.title: It’s time to start nibbling on Lowe’s and Williams-Sonoma’s stocks, analyst says
news.summary: Patient investors will see the benefits of taking small purchases of these stocks. Patient investors will be able to reap the benefits from taking small investments in these companies.
